name: Monkey Kong
description:
Monkey Kong is a #platformer Game for #Fruitylicious2D

You play as Monkey, a super intelligent chimp with the sole ambition to eat banana's.

Lucky for you the Monkey Gods are on your side and have placed you in a land filled with banana's the only catch is that in order to reach all the fruity goodness you must use your super chimp brains to avoid obstacles and navigate the world to get to all the banana's.

At the end of the level you will be faced with the Monkey God who will assess if you have enough banana's to let you finish the game.
